ui.viralSub: Scan QR code to start the test

guide.purpose: This assessment is based on the 'Big Five' theory, psychology's gold standard, analyzing your core personality traits across five dimensions.
guide.instruction: Read each statement and select the option that best matches your usual self. The more honest you are, the more accurate your profile will be.
guide.interpretation: Results consist of Openness (seeking novelty), Conscientiousness (responsibility), Extraversion (energy), Agreeableness (empathy), and Neuroticism (emotional stability). These reveal your essential personality.

items.text: I enjoy new ideas and creative approaches.
I make plans and execute them systematically.
I enjoy socializing and talking with people.
I try to understand and consider others' perspectives.
I worry a lot and often feel anxious.
I prefer traditional and proven methods.
I feel more comfortable spending time alone.
I am competitive and prioritize my own interests.
I am emotionally stable and handle stress well.

O.high: You are curious, imaginative, and seek new experiences. You have strong interests in art, philosophy, and innovative ideas.
O.low: You are practical, value tradition, and prefer stable methods. You trust realistic and proven approaches.

C.high: You are organized, responsible, and goal-oriented. You excel at making plans and seeing them through to completion.
C.low: You are flexible, free-spirited, and good at improvising. You adapt to situations without rigidity.

E.high: You are energetic, sociable, and full of vitality. You gain energy from being with people and actively communicate.
E.low: You are quiet, thoughtful, and value your inner world. You recharge through solitary time.

A.high: You are cooperative, empathetic, and considerate of others. You value harmonious relationships.
A.low: You are independent, competitive, and assertive. You clearly express your opinions.

N.high: You are emotionally sensitive and reactive to stress. You are detail-oriented and carefully consider risks.
N.low: You are emotionally stable and stress-resistant. You solve problems calmly and composedly.
